Felipe Esparza: Translate This

Ano: 2017

IMDb ID: tt7418824

Classificação: 6.7

Sinopse: Comedian Felipe Esparza in his second 1-hour special - this time on HBO. This time, Felipe's material gets more personal and focuses on his experience growing up as an immigrant in the United States, while still being very much an American. We hear more stories of the environment that created the man - gangs, drugs, growing up in the projects, etc. He also talks about being a teen father, a horrible one at that, as well as his marriage to his long-time wife and business partner who happens to be white.
